roleset.name: describe in detail
roleset.note: DETAIL-V NOTES: Might take an arg2"listener", but we'll wait and see. (from detail.01-v)

example.name: detail-v: boring
example.text: MiniScribe filed a status report with the NASD on Monday, detailing its efforts to comply with listing requirements and requesting an extension of the exception, but hasn't received a response.
example.arg: its efforts to comply with listing requirements

roleset.name: elaborate
roleset.note: DETAILED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. Frame differs from detail.01-v in that you cannot have an Arg0 with detailed (*The report was extremely detailed by him) (from detailed-j.01)

role.descr: elaborate thing or that which is elaborated on

example.name: detailed-j: elaborate thing
example.text: The colonoscopy report is not extremely detailed
